title.narrative: EYE Ethiopie, Arc Migratie

description.narrative: Project aims to contribute to increased employability of male and female youth in the Southern Corridor of Ethiopia (Borena, Hawassa, Arba Minch, Wolayita and Addis Abeba). Through awareness raising, life-, entrepreneurial and technical skills training, job mediation and multi-stakeholder cooperation, the programme will improve the capability of potential migrants to realize their full potential and improve their livelihoods which will reduce the necessity to migrate along the Southern Corridor.
EYE Ethiopië
